subject: Investing
title: Asset Class Diversification
description: A 60-second lesson on Asset Class Diversification.

hook.text: In 2022 stocks fell 19%. Commodities rose 16%. Holding both cushioned the blow.

buildup.text: Major asset classesâ€”stocks, bonds, real estate, commodities, cashâ€”react differently to economic shifts.

discovery.text: When inflation rises, commodities often gain while bonds lose. When growth slows, bonds often shine.

twist.text: Correlations change. In a panic, almost everything can drop together before diversification kicks in.

climax.text: A portfolio mixing several asset classes smooths returns over full market cycles, not every single day.

punchline.text: Blend the ingredients. No single asset class wins every year.

quiz.question: Why combine different asset classes in a portfolio?
